name: SunShine Maui
text: Your opponent cannot target other "SunShine" monsters for attacks. You can send this card from the field to the GY; "SunShine" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects for the rest of the turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "SunShine" monster from your hand, or GY, but it cannot activate its effects for the rest of the turn.
